A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: By far the worst of all Star Wars films I have seen. Growing up with Star Wars and having it be a big part of my life for most of my life I was completely shocked and disappointed to see how stupid humor has made it's way into A Galaxy Far Far away\, beyond the slap stick it was near impossible for me to look past the dismissive turn the film took to everything we as fans hold dear. I do hope that J.J Abrams can fix this mess. Obi Wan must be turning in his grave seeing this!
